queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:aggregate-to-ns-admin}}.rules[3].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:aggregate-to-ns-admin}}.rules[3].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:aggregate-to-view}}.rules[2].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:aggregate-to-view}}.rules[2].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:aggregate-to-browse}}.rules[1].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop is undefined

queries.description: Roles or ClusterRoles with RBAC permissions 'bind' or 'escalate' allow subjects to create new bindings with other roles. This is dangerous, as users with these privileges can bind to roles that may exceed their own privileges

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.rules[10].verbs should not include the 'bind' and/or 'escalate' permission
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.rules[10].verbs includes the 'bind' and/or 'escalate' permission

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.rules[9].verbs should not include the 'bind' and/or 'escalate' permission
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.rules[9].verbs includes the 'bind' and/or 'escalate' permission

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:system:aggregate-to-crossplane}}.rules[2] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane:system:aggregate-to-crossplane}}.rules[2] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch, create, update, patch, delete) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.readinessProbe should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.readinessProbe is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.readinessProbe should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.readinessProbe is undefined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{crossplane-init}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{crossplane-init}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{crossplane}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{crossplane}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{crossplane-init}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{crossplane-init}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{crossplane}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{crossplane}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.securityContext.capabilities is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.securityContext.capabilities is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}}.spec.containers.name={{crossplane}}.securityContext.capabilities is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}}.spec.initContainers.name={{crossplane-init}}.securityContext.capabilities is undefined

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{crossplane-rbac-manager}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
